metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14930 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: Memory leak in decode_line_info in dwarf2.c in the Binary File Descriptor(BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29, allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via acrafted ELF file.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
